bug.author: nh2
bug.summary: Why does the README not suggest to pass lm and trie files?
bug.description:
From the README:
deepspeech models/output_graph.pb models/alphabet.txt my_audio_file.wav
Why does this not suggest to also pass models/lm.binary and models/trie? I get much better accuracry when those are passed, compare: <denchmark-code>tearest creature in creation stydy englich pronunciation i wul teacher in my verse sounds like corps cor hors and worse </denchmark-code>
to <denchmark-code>dearest creature in creation study english pronunciation i will teach you in my verse sounds like corps core horse and worse </denchmark-code>
Putting the files into the README instructions might make for a much better first impression when people try DeepSpeech.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nh2>@nh2</denchmark-link> Patches are welcome, it's likely that we are used to doing so, and the command line documents it, so we forgot to update the README on that specific point.
